message.content: {"given_definition_quality":95,"better_definition":"the day before yesterday","sentence":"前天我上学。","image_prompt":"A young student walking to school in a soft apocalypse animation style, gentle pastel colors, distant buildings faded, a slightly surreal and dreamy atmosphere, sunlight cutting through mist, subtle signs of overgrown nature in the city, focus on a calendar with the date marked as '前天' and a cheerful child going to school.","sentence_translation":"The day before yesterday I went to school."}
